Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44647 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.27-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-44647 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.27-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package memcached is earlier than 1.6.27-3, affected by CVE-2021-44647
